title: Himi 336
lyrics:
M.N.N.
1.
’Oku ‘iate au,
‘A e fekau ke fai,
Ke tauhi hoku ‘Otua,
‘I he loto tui.
2.
Pea u fakahaofi,
Hoku laumālie,
Pea u kumi teunga ki ai,
Ki he maama lelei.
3.
Pea u tauhi foki,
‘A e me’a maama;
Pea u fai ‘i he mālohi,
Hono finangalo.
4.
Pea u fa’a vakai,
Pea fa’a lotu,
Pea ke teu’i au ‘Eiki,
Ki he fakamaau.
5.
Pea u tui ma’u pē,
Ki he ‘Afiona,
Na’a mate ‘angaua,
Hoku laumālie. *
